name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today, at Sitong Bridge in Haidian District, Beijing, where the most stringent control is being implemented on the eve of the 20th National Congress, two banners were hung. One banner reads: “We don’t want nucleic acid but we want food, we don’t want the Cultural Revolution but we want reform.” “We don’t want closure but we want freedom, we don’t want leaders but we want votes.” “We don’t want lies but we want dignity, we don’t want to be slaves but we want to be citizens.” The other banner reads: “Strike and remove the traitor Xi Jinping.” It is not known what the yellow smoke in the photo is about.

content: Can I understand this as Lao Hu being sarcastic? After all, he posted it an hour ago, so he must know what happened 😮

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Ladywu5 😅

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Don't get too excited. The Sitong Bridge incident only showed personal courage, and it doesn't represent anything.
I don't think this will cause a chain reaction. Just now, someone posted these pictures in an anti-thief group inside the wall and was immediately condemned by everyone because everyone didn't want their WeChat accounts to be blocked.
In fact, I think that if someone has stood up for you and you don't even dare to lend a hand, then you really don't deserve this freedom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
But I can't say these people are wrong, because they do face such fear, which is deeply rooted in people's hearts and is very real.
I think everyone should know that every time you experience something, your silence will tighten the shackles on you, so it has come to this point today.
You don't need to stand up yourself, you just need to let more people know that someone has actually stood up, that's all, it won't get worse.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: There is no point in making a scene on Twitter. Tomorrow when you wake up, you will still have to do nucleic acid testing, you will still have to go to the quarantine center, and you will still have to study. You come here to watch the fun, but it will not change your life. In fact, I think you may be more miserable because you know what it is like outside, but your body is still inside.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I have been saying why people inside the wall don't fight back, and I hope they won't die. But they really fight back, and you suddenly find that your account, which you have used for several years, is very valuable.
You don't need to do anything, but you tighten the chains on yourself, fearing that blood will splash on you.
So what can we do? Let's continue to welcome the 20th National Congress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @CyberT66926084 You see, actually many people are quite afraid of WeChat, but I do have a lot of anti-thief groups on WeChat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Sparks can start a prairie fire, provided that the grass next to it is flammable.
If the grass next to it is saline-alkali land, you can't start a fire even if you burn yourself

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why did Iran have a protest just because of a headscarf? Because people can't accept it.
To put it bluntly, whether it is re-election or a more stringent zero-lockdown, the essence is that the Chinese can accept it all.
So as a person living overseas, it is difficult to say anything.
In the future, I will continue to focus on individual suffering and help ordinary people speak out.
But what do you want to change? You Chinese should work hard on yourselves.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @nemocha91354408 idiot, can you understand what you are saying?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @xxxx304567xxz There is nothing different. Even if it is the Republic of China now, there are still other reasons. The key to this place is that the people will never fight for others, but only hope that others will fight for them, and they will pick up the fruits behind. So in the end, whether they pick up good fruits or bad fruits, they will accept them with pleasure.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This inmate is wrong. Respecting others is a matter of personal upbringing and has nothing to do with who the other person is. It is ridiculous to mistake someone else's upbringing for your own advantage.

content:

In the future, you will have to go through security check before going on bridges in China

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some friends in the comments, please stop saying but
You are here putting out a lot of reasons and saying that you have difficulties
You are afraid because you assume that no one will help you if you stand up, and in fact, this is the effect they want.
But he doesn’t have a WeChat account? He doesn’t have a family? He is willing to stand up and speak for everyone, asking for a normal life. Doesn’t he realize the danger he will face?
How does it make you look particularly smart and reasonable?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reminds me of the ending of Curse of the Golden Flower
After a massacre outside the palace, the scene quickly returned to peace and prosperity, with songs and laughter welcoming the Double Ninth Festival banquet
I originally thought that Zhang Yimou was alluding to the June Fourth Incident, but later I discovered that it has always been like this in life

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: My waist hurts so much. Do you know that I have blown up 54 accounts on Weibo? The shortest time is 14 minutes to blow up one. In order to prevent me from reincarnating, even my ID has been blown up to a sensitive word. There is nothing to say. Your choice is your life. To endure or to keep up with the pace and exert a little effort, it is your life that determines it. I am not the one who does nucleic acid twice a day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Today's incident seems to be that the anti-treasonists are not easily blocked because of their political sensitivity and skills, but ordinary people have been blocked a lot because they don't realize the seriousness of the matter.
